title: consultantLink
content:
Help Manual for Link/Delink Screen

This screen is used by administrators to manage the linking or delinking of applicants to specific consultants.

1. Page Overview

  • Title: Link/Delink â€“ This screen is for linking available applicants to consultants or delinking those who are already associated.
  • Admin Section: This section indicates the admin mode for managing consultants and applicants.

2. Functional Elements

  • Search Consultants Bar:
    • Location: Top-left of the screen.
    • Function: Allows the admin to search for consultants by typing a name into the search field. The system will filter consultants based on the entered text.
  • Select Consultant Dropdown:
    • Location: To the right of the search bar.
    • Function: A dropdown list to select the current consultant being managed. In the image example, "William Brown" is selected.
  • Applicants Linked to [Consultant's Name] Section:
    • Location: Below the consultant selection field.
    • Function: Displays a list of applicants already linked to the selected consultant (in this case, "William Brown").
    • Information Shown:
      • Applicant Full Name: Displays the full name of the linked applicant.
      • Business Name: Displays the business associated with the applicant.
      • Actions:
        • Delink Button (Red): Used to remove the link between the applicant and the consultant. In this case, clicking the Delink button next to "Rose Pink" will delink her from William Brown.
  • Available Applicants Section:
    • Location: Below the list of linked applicants.
    • Function: Displays a list of applicants not currently linked to the selected consultant.
    • Information Shown:
      • Applicant Full Name: Shows the name of the available applicant.
      • Business Name: Shows the business name associated with the applicant.
      • Actions:
        • Link Button (Blue): Used to link an available applicant to the selected consultant. For example, clicking Link next to "Hank Mann" will link him to William Brown.

3. Icons and Buttons

  • Back Button (Top Left): Allows the admin to go back to the previous page or menu.
  • Chat/Help Icon (Top Right): Possibly for customer support or guidance if needed.

4. Actions Flow

Linking an Applicant:

  1. Search for or select a consultant using the dropdown.
  2. Scroll to the "Available Applicants" section.
  3. Click the Link button next to the desired applicant.
  4. The applicant will now appear in the "Applicants Linked to [Consultant's Name]" section.

Delinking an Applicant:

  1. Search for or select a consultant using the dropdown.
  2. In the "Applicants Linked to [Consultant's Name]" section, locate the applicant to be delinked.
  3. Click the Delink button next to the applicant's name.
  4. The applicant will now move to the "Available Applicants" section.

5. User Tips

  • Ensure the correct consultant is selected before performing any linking or delinking actions.
  • Use the search bar to quickly find specific consultants.
  • Always review the applicant's details (name and business) to avoid linking or delinking the wrong person.
